name: Elementscape
description:
- About -

In "Elementscape" you play a golem with diffrent element skills.

Find the element crystal to save the world.

Switch to the same element as the platform,

but think ahead which element will come next.

The game was made in Unreal Engine 5.

You can finish it in about 10-15 minutes.

I am a 23 years old game design student from Germany and this is my fourth real game. It was made within six months.

 Feedback or opinions about the game are very welcome.

 I hope you have fun playing!

- Credits -
